content: Every day, a tree drops 7 leaves. How many leaves would it drop in a month of February in a non-leap year? Include your logic.
In analytical chemistry, what is the principle behind the use of an internal standard in quantitative analysis?
A rectangular garden has a length of 25 feet and a width of 15 feet. If you want to build a fence around the entire garden, how many feet of fencing will you need?
What was the purpose of the Colosseum in Rome?

A man claims he can predict the outcome of a dice roll with 90% accuracy. If he predicts correctly on his first attempt, what is the probability that he actually has the ability to predict dice rolls with 90% accuracy? Assume there's a 1% chance that someone can have this ability.
